item.title: Episode 1 - Sat Nov 29 2025
item.description: Top Stories for Sat Nov 29 2025 Here are the links for the stories: Hyperlinks 1. https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/269116/pope-leo-xiv-and-bartholomew-i-deeply-alarmed-by-global-tensions 2. https://www.vaticannews.va/en/pope/news/2025/11/pope-leo-xiv-mass-turkey-catholic-ecumenical-interreligious-unity.html 3. https://www.vaticannews.va/en/pope/news/2025/11/pope-leo-xiv-visits-emblematic-turkish-mosque-sign-fraternity.html 4. https://www.vaticannews.va/en/pope/news/2025/11/pope-leo-xiv-marks-nicaea-anniversary-urges-christians-overcome-divisions.html 5. https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/269117/pope-leo-xiv-appoints-2-new-archbishops-for-western-canada-dioceses
